item.title: MIUI OS1.0.27.0.UNNCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K70 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K70 Ultra China

Codename: rothko

Version: OS1.0.27.0.UNNCNXM | 14.0

Size: 9.1 GB

MD5: 5372a56abd8a6064fe4b05c61b3308ba

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Wi-Fi router connectivity for specific scenarios
Optimization: Power consumption and overall experience for top games
Optimization: Performance and experience adjustments for short videos
Optimization: Battery health management
Optimization: Improved video synchronization strategy to enhance playback smoothness
Fix: Compatibility issues with wireless tethering
Fix: Compatibility issues for some types of networks
[System]
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
